Html:
Hi Roman,

Thanks for your tool it great.   What opinion have you about "OSLO" ?   It's can work with Grammar free-context by example ..

I see that Daniel Flower build an DSL perfectly with Irony ... into yacc-like syntax with Irony!

Best Regards!, 
Jorge

Hi
I would prefer to abstain from commenting on similar or competing technologies, at least on this site. You guys decide for yourself - all bits are there, Irony here, OSLO at msdn site, download, build, compare, decide.
thanks

Hi Roman, 

I am sorry please recieve my apologies... But my intention is know the direction and future of the Irony, if possible update your roadmap in special adoption of new features C#3.0 and so on.Thanks!
Jorge

no need to apologise, just normal exchange "what's your take?" - "no comments"
As for Irony future, it is bright, it continues, hopefully get to official 1.0 release this year. Roadmap - thanks for reminding, will update it.
Roman
